title: How to Draw the Three Legendary Birds from Pokémon

steps.headline: Draw Zapdos's basic body shape which is a curved rectangle with spikes at each end of the top (the wings) like a tree and with a spiky pattern at the bottom (the tail).
Attach the head which is a circle with spikes over it.
Add in the almond shaped eyes and the long triangle shaped beak.
Attach the bird limbs with claws.
If you want, add some clouds and lightning.
steps.description: Highlight all the lines you need and erase all unnecessary lines.

steps.headline: Draw a basic shape of a Cage Sugar Bird which has a long wavy tail and angel wings.
steps.description: Don't forget to add the hair on Articuno's body.

steps.headline: Add the face by drawing a head, short beak, thin semicircle shaped eyes and the crest which is three feathers.
If you want, add some clouds and precipitation (such as snow and rain).
steps.description: Highlight all the lines you need and erase all unnecessary lines.

steps.headline: Draw Moltres' body shape which is a shape of a thin spade (card).
Add an oval face, a long beak, cone shaped eyes and decorate the wings by making them burn with fire.
Add the crest as well which is just fire burning upwards.
If you want, add some clouds and fire.
steps.description: Highlight all the lines you need and erase all unnecessary lines.

text: Zapdos Draw Zapdos's basic body shape which is a curved rectangle with spikes at each end of the top (the wings) like a tree and with a spiky pattern at the bottom (the tail).  Attach the head which is a circle with spikes over it.  Add in the almond shaped eyes and the long triangle shaped beak.  Attach the bird limbs with claws.  If you want, add some clouds and lightning. Highlight all the lines you need and erase all unnecessary lines. Color it in if desired.  Articuno Draw a basic shape of a Cage Sugar Bird which has a long wavy tail and angel wings. Don't forget to add the hair on Articuno's body. Add the face by drawing a head, short beak, thin semicircle shaped eyes and the crest which is three feathers.  If you want, add some clouds and precipitation (such as snow and rain). Highlight all the lines you need and erase all unnecessary lines. Color it in if desired.  Moltres Draw Moltres' body shape which is a shape of a thin spade (card).  Add an oval face, a long beak, cone shaped eyes and decorate the wings by making them burn with fire.  Add the crest as well which is just fire burning upwards.  If you want, add some clouds and fire. Highlight all the lines you need and erase all unnecessary lines. Color it in if desired.

Add the crest as well which is just fire burning upwards.

Highlight all the lines you need and erase all unnecessary lines.
